targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  lifetimedata AS "time",
  lifetimedata
FROM solaredge_overview_api

SELECT
  lastyearenergy AS "time",
  lastyearenergy
FROM solaredge_overview_api

SELECT
  lastmonthenergy AS "time",
  lastmonthenergy
FROM solaredge_overview_api

SELECT
  lastdayenergy AS "time",
  lastdayenergy
FROM solaredge_overview_api

SELECT
  currentpower AS "time",
  currentpower AS "currentpower"
FROM solaredge_overview_api

panels.title: Solar Energy Prediction and Production (University of Oulu)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(forecast_time,$__interval),
  avg(power_output_w) AS "power_output_w",
  avg(power_output_f0_w) AS "power_output_f0_w",
  avg(power_output_f10_w) AS "power_output_f10_w",
  avg(power_output_f25_w) AS "power_output_f25_w",
  avg(power_output_f50_w) AS "power_output_f50_w",
  avg(power_output_f75_w) AS "power_output_f75_w",
  avg(power_output_f90_w) AS "power_output_f90_w",
  avg(power_output_f100_w) AS "power_output_f100_w"
FROM fmi_data
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(forecast_time,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(DATE,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "power"
FROM energy_power_production
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(DATE,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(forecast_time,$__interval),
  avg(power_output_w) AS "power_output_w",
  avg(power_output_f0_w) AS "power_output_f0_w",
  avg(power_output_f10_w) AS "power_output_f10_w",
  avg(power_output_f25_w) AS "power_output_f25_w",
  avg(power_output_f50_w) AS "power_output_f50_w",
  avg(power_output_f75_w) AS "power_output_f75_w",
  avg(power_output_f90_w) AS "power_output_f90_w",
  avg(power_output_f100_w) AS "power_output_f100_w"
FROM energy_weather
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(forecast_time,$__interval)

SELECT
  time_stamp AS "time",
  payload
FROM consumption
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_stamp)
ORDER BY time_stamp

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(DATE,$__interval),
  avg(energy) AS "energy"
FROM energy_power_production
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(DATE,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(forecast_time,$__interval),
  avg(system_radiation_global_wm2) AS "system_radiation_global_wm2",
  avg(system_radiation_direct_wm2) AS "system_radiation_direct_wm2",
  avg(system_radiation_diffuse_wm2) AS "system_radiation_diffuse_wm2",
  avg(radiation_global_wm2) AS "radiation_global_wm2",
  avg(radiation_direct_wm2) AS "radiation_direct_wm2",
  avg(radiation_diffuse_wm2) AS "radiation_diffuse_wm2"
FROM energy_weather
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(forecast_time,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(forecast_time,$__interval),
  avg(cloud_cover_high) AS "cloud_cover_total"
FROM energy_weather
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(forecast_time,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(forecast_time,$__interval),
  avg(cloud_cover_medium) AS "cloud_cover_medium"
FROM energy_weather
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(forecast_time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(forecast_time,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(forecast_time,$__interval),
  avg(cloud_cover_low) AS "cloud_cover_low"
FROM energy_weather
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(forecast_time,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(forecast_time,$__interval),
  avg(System_temperature_c) AS "System_temperature_c"
FROM energy_weather
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(forecast_time,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(forecast_time,$__interval),
  avg(air_temperature_c) AS "air_temperature_c"
FROM energy_weather
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(forecast_time,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(forecast_time,$__interval),
  avg(nominal_output_efficiency) AS "nominal_output_efficiency"
FROM energy_weather
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(forecast_time,$__interval)
